ygData.subject: RE: Bind for Guk?
ygData.msgSnippet: I get bound in grobb.  If you bind just inside the zone, you can use sneak to get out if you hug the right wall and go behind the 2 bashers there. Occasionally
ygData.messageBody:
I get bound in grobb. If you bind just inside the zone, you can use
sneak to get out if you hug the right wall and go behind the 2 bashers
there.

Occasionally basher Sutok will be just inside the zone line, which can
be a pain. But as long as you can take 1 or 2 hits, you'll last the 4
seconds needed to back out of the zone after you appear.


> From: Ezra Harrington <tvar@...>
>
> Adventuring in Guk was recently mentioned in the 7th Level Qeynos
> Blues,
> and that reminded me of a question I have been meaning to ask. Where
> is
> the nearest place to get bound for adventuring in Guk for a Monk (of
> course)? Freeport? North Ro -> Oasis of Marr -> South Ro -> Innotule
> Swamp -> Guk = Not fun. Anything closer?
>
>
